name: Equilibrium (Chyrro)
description:
This game has been made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam, which theme was 'Out of Control'.

You have to make your way out of the labyrinth, while taking care of your needs and emotions. 

Don't get overwhelmed by them, or you could face some troubles.

Your needs impact your emotions, and your emotions impact your stats, such as your strength, your speed or your luck.

Have fun!
